WhyChooseSection.title: Why choose our Black Friday personal cloud storage deals?

titles: Our biggest Black Friday deal ever
descriptions: All paid Internxt plans include post-quantum encrypted storage, backups, and Antivirus. For complete online protection, you also get VPN, Cleaner, Meet, and Mail, everything you need to stay secure online.

Get the first cloud storage with post-quantum encryption to upload, store, and share your files in total privacy with our end-to-end encrypted cloud service. Backup and sync your files to prevent data loss and ensure smooth collaboration with friends, family, or colleagues.

Take advantage of our biggest Black Friday offer yet with even more features to protect your data and files online. With a massive 90% off, now is the perfect time to get the best value on secure and private cloud storage, and more!

HorizontalScrollableSection.title: The most secure cloud storage, and more, for less
HorizontalScrollableSection.description: We build all our products with privacy in mind. We don't run our business on data or advertising; we build it on trust. Our post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption ensures you, and only you, can access your files.

descriptions: We don't store passwords or user data, and all of your data is encrypted in transit and at rest. Internxt puts you in full control of your files. Your data is your business. Protecting it is ours.
Your files are end-to-end encrypted before ever leaving your device. Thanks to zero-knowledge and post-quantum encryption, you are the absolutely only one with access to your data.

We are proud of what we do, so our code is made public on GitHub; we have nothing to hide but your data. Internxt has also been independently audited and verified by Europe's leading penetration testing company, Securitum.

Internxt is GDPR, HIPAA, ISO 27001, and SOC 2 compliant. Whether you need cloud storage for healthcare, finance, or personal use, Internxt ensures your data and files meet the highest standards of data protection.

faq.question: How do I get the Internxt Black Friday Discount?
answer: To claim your discount, choose from our Essential, Premium, or Ultimate plan and head to the checkout page. Your 90% discount is automatically applied at checkout.

faq.question: When do the Black Friday personal cloud storage deals end?
answer: The Black Friday sale ends December 3rd, 2025.

faq.question: Who is eligible for these Black Friday cloud storage deals?
answer: If you're a new user, you can enjoy this discount by creating an account. If you have a lifetime plan, you can upgrade to get more storage and the extra features such as Cleaner, Meet, and Mail.

faq.question: Will I keep my discount when my plan ends?
answer: The Black Friday deal is valid until the end of the subscription period. Your subscription will automatically renew at the regular price once this subscription period ends at the end of the year. As lifetime plans only require one payment, your discount will last forever.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc.). You can also pay through PayPal, Crypto, and Klarna.

faq.question: Can I split my lifetime payment?
answer: Yes, you can now split your lifetime payments into multiple interest-free installments using Klarna. Enjoy a lifetime plan with the ease of paying for it in easy installments!

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: Feel free to contact us at [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com) or visit our help center.

faq.question: What is Internxt's refund policy?
answer: Internxt offers a standard 30-day money-back guarantee across all its paid subscriptions, which starts counting as soon as you subscribe.
And if you're ever unsatisfied with our service, reach out to us at hello@internxt.com and request a refund.
